alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 3:36PM MST until November 09 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory tonight, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the High Wind Watch, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains and Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 6 AM MST Wednesday. For the High Wind Watch, from Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
